ISSUE.TITLE: Support deserializing string to numeric property
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Previously using Newtonsoft, we ere able to deserialize a string from a string to numeric. In other words the following two json worked ``` {"name":"One","value":"1","Weight":1} ``` ``` {"name":"One","value":"1","Weight":"1"} ``` when deserializing to ``` public sealed class CustomListValueOption : ListValueOption { public string Name { get; set; } public string Value { get; set; } public double? Weight { get; set; } } ``` This no longer works after converting to using System Json Text.

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Support deserializing string to numeric values Fix #16059
